strings.ImportPM_ICQ: From the history of ICQ 7 and above
strings.CHATButtonCaption: History of the chat messages in %s
strings.IMNoTab: There is not one open tab.
strings.CHATNoTab: There is no open tabs chat.
strings.ButtonDeleteCurrentHistory: Delete history of the current contact
strings.NoDeleteSelectHistory: Not selected for removal of contact history
strings.NoSelectContactRefreshHistory: Select the contact to refresh history
strings.DeleteHistory: History of the selected contact will be deleted. Are you sure?
strings.DeleteAllHistory: History of all contacts and chat rooms will be deleted. Are you sure?
strings.SendSyncQuery: [%s] HistoryToDBSync sent a request to synchronize history
strings.ShowHistoryAll: Show history for the entire period
strings.CBWriteErrLog: Write errors to a log file
strings.CBHideSyncIcon: Hide HistoryToDBSync icon from the tray
strings.LNumLastHistoryMsg: Number of recent messages to display in the window history of correspondence
strings.CBShowPluginButton: Add the button plug-in to modules panel (for only IM-client QIP 2012 and RnQ)
strings.UpdateMessage2: A new version of the program.
strings.UpdateMessage3: Please visit the official website for updates.
strings.UpdateMessage4: The structure of your database is outdated.
strings.GoodDBConnect2: Connecting to the database is successfully established.
strings.ErrVersionCheck: Unable to verify the version of the plugin.
strings.ErrDBConnect: Unable to connect to the database.
strings.SendCheckMD5HashQuery: [%s] HistoryToDBSync sent a request to recalculate the MD5-hashes
strings.SendCheckAndDeleteMD5HashQuery: [%s] HistoryToDBSync sent a request to recalculate the MD5-hashes and remove duplicate messages
strings.CheckMD5Hash: Recalculate of all the MD5-hashes in the database
strings.CheckAndDeleteMD5Hash: Recalculate of all the MD5-hashes in the database and remove duplicate messages
strings.MessageEncrypted: WARNING! This message is encrypted. Perhaps you entered an incorrect password or encryption key in the database is not found the right key to decrypt the message.
strings.LErrLogSize: The maximum size of log file errors (Kbyte)
strings.UpdateContactListButton: Update contact information in the DB
strings.SaveContactListCompleted: A list of contacts and protocols stored.
strings.SaveContactListErr: Error! Contact list and protocols are not saved or stored properly.
strings.SendUpdateContactListCompleted: Sent a request to update the list of contacts in the database.
strings.SendUpdateContactListErr: The file %s to update your contact list can not be found. Request for update is not sent.
strings.UpdateContactListInDB: Update contact information in the DB (Nickname и UserID)
strings.GIFStaticTextDelete: Please wait, is removal of the history...
strings.SendUpdateContactListInDB: [%s] HistoryToDBSync sent a request to update the contact list from a file %s
strings.SendUpdateContactListInDBErrQIP: [%s] File %s to update your contact list can not be found. Please, select 'Save contact list' in the context menu, Other contacts QIPHistoryToDB.
strings.SendUpdateContactListInDBErrRnQ: [%s] The file %s to update your contact list can not be found. Select 'Save contact list' in the context menu RnQHistoryToDB in the chat window.
strings.SendUpdateContactListInDBErrUnknown: [%s] The file %s to update your contact list can not be found. Select 'Save contact list' in the context menu plugin.
strings.SendStopSync: [%s] HistoryToDBSync sent a request to disable synchronization of the history of the file %s.
strings.SendStartSync: [%s] HistoryToDBSync sent a request to enable synchronization of the history of the file %s.
strings.CBBlockSpamMsg: Do not write messages in the DB marked as spam (for only IM-client QIP 2012)
strings.ErrKeyPassword: Error: Invalid password encryption key. Enter the correct password or reading encrypted messages will be impossible.
strings.CBExPrivateChatName: Use the expanded name for private chat (ChatName / Nickname)
strings.SyncWhenExit: Synchronize history when you close the IM-client
strings.IMExportWizardPage0Title: Welcome to the export wizard history
strings.IMExportWizardPage0SubTitle: This wizard helps you export the story of %s to the external database. Exports will be made to a file in sql-insert. When you synchronize the data will be transmitted to the database.
strings.IMExportWizardPage1SubTitle: Select the contacts whose history you want to export.
strings.IMExportWizardPage2SubTitle: There is a history of exporting, please wait...
strings.ExportAbort: Are you sure you want to cancel the export and exit the wizard?
strings.ExportDoneDesc: Export of finished histori. Now you can send a request to synchronize the history of the exported database. A high volume of exported history synchronization procedure can be done a long time.
strings.MirandaImportInfo: Import messages from the database directly from the Miranda of the IM-client.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncCLUpdateErr: During the upgrade, contact list error.
strings.SeeErrLog: For additional information, see the log files.
strings.DBReConnectNum: [%s] We make %s attempts to reconnect to the database.
strings.DBReConnectErr: [%s] Failed to reconnect to the database.
strings.ExitSkypeOnEnd: Shutdown Skype when you close HistoryToDBSync
strings.UpdateServerInServiceMode: Update server is down for maintenance.%sTry to start the procedure to check for updates later.
strings.ERR_SAVE_TO_DB_CONNECT_ERR: [%s] Error: Unable to connect to the database. Error: %s
strings.ERR_SAVE_TO_DB_SERVICE_MODE: [%s] Error: Database on service mode. Saving messages in the database is impossible.
strings.ERR_TEMP_SAVE_TO_DB_SERVICE_MODE: [%s] Error: Database on service mode. Saving of pending messages in the database is impossible.
strings.ERR_READ_DB_CONNECT_ERR: [%s] Error: Unable to connect to the database. Error: %s
strings.ERR_READ_DB_SERVICE_MODE: [%s] Error: Unable to perform operation. Database on service mode.
strings.ERR_LOAD_MSG_TO_DB: [%s] Write error messages from the log file to the database: %s
strings.LOAD_TEMP_MSG: [%s] The file %s found %s messages; Loaded in DB: %s; Bad: %s; Duplicate: %s; Encrypted: %s
strings.LOAD_TEMP_MSG_SCREEN: Found %s messages; Loaded in DB: %s; Bad: %s; Duplicate: %s; Encrypted: %s
strings.ERR_NO_FOUND_SYNC: The history synchronization program %s not found.
strings.ERR_OLD_SDK_VER: Wrong SDK version. To work needed QIP 2012 and above.
strings.ERR_NO_FOUND_IMPORT: The history import program %s not found.
strings.ERR_DB_SERVICE_MODE: Unable to perform operation. Database on service mode.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncFileNotFound: File synchronization can not be found
strings.HistoryToDBSyncUnknownIMClient: Unknown type IM-client. Updating the database is impossible.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncUpdateErr: An error occurred when update the database. Look in the log file.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncErrKeyPassword: Error: Wrong key password. Enter the correct password or encryption of messages is not available.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncErrActiveKey: Error: Could not find the active key
strings.HistoryToDBSyncMultiActiveKey: Error: There is more than one active key
strings.HistoryToDBSyncCBSaveOnly: Remember the password for this session
strings.HistoryToDBSyncErrDecryptKey: Unknown error decrypting the encryption key.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncNoKey: Error: Not found the right encryption key.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncCLFileNotFound: Not found a file with a list of protocols and contacts.
strings.HistoryToDBSyncSkypeErrCreate: Error creating an instance of Skype
strings.HistoryToDBSyncSkypeErrDelete: Error deleting an instance of Skype
strings.HistoryToDBSyncSkypeErrAttach: Error connecting to an instance of Skype
strings.HistoryToDBSyncSkypeRun: We are trying to run Skype...
strings.HistoryToDBSyncSkypeNotFound: Most likely you have not installed Skype and its version below 5.0
strings.ImportRecordStart: There is a record in SQL-file...
strings.ImportDoneSyncWait: Import finished. After the next synchronization session, all information will be added to the database.
strings.ImportICQDBConnected: You are connected to the database %s
strings.ImportICQDBLocked: The database is locked. Close the client ICQ 7 and try again.
strings.ImportICQFoundHistory: Found the history of the correspondence with the user %s
strings.GetEncryptPassword: Enter a password for the encryption key.
strings.CheckActiveEncryptKey: Do you already have an active key, change the status of the old key and repeat the operation to generate a new key.
strings.SaveEncryptKeyDone: Your new key is generated and stored in No. %s
strings.SaveDBEncryptKeyDone: Your new key is generated and stored in the database as No. %s
strings.SaveEncryptKeyDoneHelp: Please remember the password and the key No.
strings.SaveEncryptKeyErr: An error occurred when saving the key in the database. Check the settings of the database and try again.
strings.CheckNumActiveEncryptKey: The database already has an active key. Change the status of the active key, and then return to this operation.
strings.DeleteEncryptKey: The database found messages encrypted with that key. Are you sure you want to delete this key?
strings.DeleteActiveEncryptKey: WARNING! You are about to delete the active key. Without the active key encryption of messages is impossible.
strings.ErrKeyPasswordChange: Entered an incorrect current password encryption key.
strings.ErrKeyPasswordChangeNotRenew: The new password and confirmation do not match, or blank. Please try again.
strings.KeyPasswordChanged: Password for the encryption key is changed.
strings.UpdateStatus: Click the "Update" button to start the update process.
strings.InvalidResponseHeader: Invalid response header from the server.
strings.InvalidResponseHeaderDesc: Check the settings for connecting to the Internet. Maybe your proxy server blocks access to the site updates.
strings.ErrDownloadingFile: An error occurred while reading the file.
strings.ErrRequest: Failed to query the data through a proxy server.
strings.ManualUpdate: Close all the components plugin, IM clients and try to repeat the update.
strings.ChecksumConfirmed: Checksum and file size are confirmed.
strings.ChecksumFileEqServer: Checksum file to disk and server are the same.
strings.ChecksumNotConfirmed: Not correct the checksum of the received data.
strings.SizeNotConfirmed: Not true size of the received data.
strings.NumberFilesUpdate: The number of files to update
strings.InMemoryFoundProcess: In the memory of the process found %s (PID: %s)
strings.SendExitCommand: Send the command to the end of the program...
strings.SearchProcessInMemory: Re looking for process %s in the memory...
strings.KillProcess: Trying to force terminated the process %s
strings.NotKillProcess: Process %s can not be forcibly terminated.
strings.SeDebugPrivilege: Set SeDebugPrivilege and try again to terminate the process %s
strings.NotKillSeDebugPrivilege: Process %s can not be forced to terminated in SeDebugPrivilege.
strings.EndProcess: We are trying to close the process %s
